name: Erik Cross
text:
I have to say that for a chain restaurant, the pizza is very good.
The pizza is prepared right before your eyes and put into the oven.
The food prep area is very clean and the ingredients fresh. …More

name: Seen Love
text: The restaurant was clean, required a facemask for COVID-19 and practiced social distancing. Staff was pleasant and helpful. It was busy and picking up for Friday night. There were plenty of options to choose from: different sauces, cheeses …More

name: Natonya Lee
text: We enjoyed trying a different pizza place. My husband liked it more than me and I would’ve gave it one more star but our cheese pizza’s crust was a bit too burned for my taste. The workers were all very kind and helpful.

name: Loyalty Amongst Friends
text: Amazing. Drink sizes could be better. But I'm glad I'm moving to Alcoa and have one of these just 5 minutes from where I'm going to be living at. Well worth the 9 dollars.

name: Amber Butzen
text: Amazing fresh and even keto friendly! My daughter loves their pizza too. The staff was so friendly and helpful too for our first time there! Thanks Blaze Pizza for putting a smile on my daughters face today<3

name: Jennifer Raub
text: Their pizza was great... Pizza bar is awesome you, get as many toppings as you want for the same price. They have a spicy sauce which you don't see much love that, and the white sauce is so good too!

name: Christian Burns
text: I have been to the other blaze pizza locations in west knoxville and everytime it was great/ very tasteful and you get a good deal for what you pay for. 8$ for a personal pizza is a steal, however the medium drink feels more like a child's …More

name: Rasma Arums Motykowski
text: Quite impressed! Very friendly and helpful workers! Would definitely stop.in again.

name: sonya hendricks
text: I am absolutely disappointed and disgusted by the meal I just paid for.  I take no pleasure in writing a bad review but I feel like it is my responsibility to warn people from wasting their hard earned money. …More

name: Tonja Fecto
text: This Blaze pizza was so good. Miss the food here. New GM was a nice guy.

name: Teresa S.
text: Great drink bar, order was perfect, added a little cooking time for my pizza, it was delicious

name: Closet Dweller
text: I love this place! It has everything incuding a keto, GF, and a vegan pizza! Thry uave a bulid your own pizza where you can get as many toppings and sause and chesse as you want. I personally get triple the sauce the keto i will admit isnt …More

name: Brian Davis
text: Ordered online for curbside.  We called the pickup number at least 10 times and no one ever picked up. We finally went in to pickup the pizza and they said oh yeah the phones are messed up.  There was no signage in the pickup area …More

name: MARK EVANS
text: really enjoy the food here and the staff had always been nice

name: Wayne Freeman
text: Our first time here.  The staff was super friendly explaining the menu and made suggestions.

name: Crystal Toppins
text: Excellent food, friendly and fast customer service. 10/10 will come again.

name: Kayla C
text: Such a neat place. I love being able to choose everything about my personal size pizza and the salad was terrific as well. I'm disappointed I didn't know this was here sooner. The employees were very patient explaining what options they had even during busy lunch rush. Excellent choice. Delicious food!

name: Michael Duncan
text: Pizza was great figured it would take a bit for it to cook but they had it out to us in no time.

name: Shannon Larivee
text: Finally tried Blaze Pizza and I'm so glad I did! The pizza was loaded with fresh toppings and had a perfect NY crust. This is not your typical franchise pizza. I'd highly recommend!

name: Samuel Bunting
text: One of the best pizzas I’ve ever had! The staff was super friendly and gave me info on ordering since it was my first time being there! The pizza was perfect l, super fresh, and filled me up! I will come back when I can!

name: Tracy Serio
text: Delicious food. Great customer service!!!

name: Latisha Sudderth
text: I have been coming to this location since they have been open and I always appreciate it. The team members are always accomodating and treat their customers so well. My food is always exactly how I like it and they make sure I am satisfied. Just an all around great experience.

name: Stephen Duremdez
text: Hasn’t let me down the whole time I was here for training.  Was able to taste their whole menu from the gluten free to high rise (which I recommend).  Was able to get in and out during the times I was in and if there was a line I just order …More

name: Glenn Vitale
text: Great pizza, build your own and you cannot go wrong. If you dont like your pizza it has to be your own fault.

name: Wendy Waxmonsky
text: Great fire baked pizza!! Made to order (Subway style). Wide range of fresh ingredients. Great salads made to order as well. Regular soda options and sodas with sugar rather than corn syrup. Smores for dessert options...they will heat them if you ask.

name: Cia Yavon
text: I don't know why I haven't tried this place before. You can build your own 11 inch pizza (approx 6 slices) for only $8.25 and they have great toppings to choose from.

name: Glen Farr
text: Good pizza and friendly service.

name: Becky Boatman
text: The pizza builder are fabulous to my gluten free grandson thank u

name: Eric Whitener
text: One of our go to spots for the family. Everyone can get exactly what they want in a pizza. Service is most often fast and friendly. Also makes good leftovers for whatever you don't finish there.

name: scott
text: THEY SAID IF I DOTN RATE 5 STAR I GET ON FIRE LIKE BLAZE

name: Shad Kerr
text: Awesome pizza, and I loved how they addressed you by name to ask you questions.

name: Victoria
text: They work quickly and do a good job assembling quickly, but this particular location has a parking issue and they never offer to add any of the additional toppings after the pizza comes out.  I almost always add something (arugula or …More

name: Billy Harmon
text: Love their pizza!  They have friendly and happy employees who make the experience there worth it.

name: Tim
text: This is a cool pizza place. You build your own pizza and then it’s cooked for you!

name: Kimberly Combs
text: We ordered on the app so when we got there our pizza was ready they said 18 minutes for 4 pizzas we arrived about 20 minutes after submitting our order the pizza was still hot we walked in got our food and sat down inside to eat a manager came over to check on us about 1/2 way into our meal everything turned out fantastic

name: Larry Schumaker
text: Excellent pizza .Employees are great.

name: Carolyn Breeden
text: Fantastic build your own salads. Love the balsamic dressing. Really friendly & nice people too!

name: Kellyn Green
text: This was my family's first time eating here in Maryville, Tn. The employees were all very nice and smiling also helpful because we did not know what to do! I ordered half a pizza and a side salad ( which was huge). You can pick whatever …More

name: Chrissie York
text: They are always very nice and they wore mask and everybody kept distance

name: Tony Hook
text: Cool environment and fast service for pizza. However, it was like eating toast with a couple topping pieces and a drop of sauce. The signature pizzas we tried were bland, dry and boring.

name: Belou
text:
Delicious gluten free pizza
The crust is crispy cracker tasting …More

name: Justin Benson
text: A good experience. We visited on a Sunday around 12:30. It was very busy, and loud. The team was quick, but there wasn't enough space to sit and it was hard to hear the employees as we were trying to make our pizzas. But, the quality of the food was great.

name: Lance Brumbalough
text: The pizza was not very good. There was little cheese on it. The toppings were sparse and what toppings were on the pizza looked like someone just tossed them on there without any thought of placement. Pizza places are a dime a dozen! It seems like they would want to set themselves apart by taking pride in their work!

name: Anthony Payne
text: Delicious pizza, get it the way you want it and it's done fast!  The crust is perfect and the toppings are fresh, don't forget to get the garlic knots!

name: Ashley Wertz
text: First time here and the food is delicious and fast.

name: Sherard Orange
text: WOW!!! This place is awesome. Very friendly and helpful staff! The best deal is to create your own pizza. Pile on all the toppings for one low price. I was really impressed they had fresh mozzarella! You can’t get that at the pizza chains. We will be back.

name: Kelly Hernandez
text: It was a wonderful experience, first time trying out this place. Such a good atmosphere and the pizza tasted so delicious! Also, wonderful service, they helped me know more about the place and what they do.

name: Jodi Szalapski
text: This was delicious! My husband and I both got the 1/2 pizza and salad. It was very Good! The service here is an A+!!! All of the employees were helpful, professional and courteous. I would recommend and we will be back!

name: Renee Hickmon
text: Have to definitely try the cauliflower crust.. delicious!!!

name: Sam Jackson
text: I love the atmosphere at Blaze. It is a great place to meet up with friends. Their pizza for the money is a pretty good deal. They have toppings and sauces for just about any appetite.  For the volume of business they do the orders come out …More

name: Kelly Thomas
text: Always great service and their pizzas are sooo good! Mine and my boyfriend’s favorite place to get pizza! 😋

name: Shannon Lowe
text: Fresh ingredients,  nice staff. Sometimes long lines, beer only. Better if eaten there as pizza looses it's crispiness on drive home. Seems to be very popular  as it's always crowded

name: Alyssa Floyd
text: Food was amazing. Nice and hot, made to order, tasted great! The staff was very helpful and polite.

name: John Watts
text: Friendly staff and great pizza

name: Ranell Wolf
text: This is one of the best pizzas around. Great food and even though there was a line when we got there it moved along pretty quickly.

name: David Arnopole
text: Customer experience was great, they took the time to explain the different crusts and the best way to save me $ with my custom orders. A little costly if everyone gets their own pizza, but it's custom pizza.

name: Jeremy Murphy
text:
Another great new Blaze location.  Fantastic pizza.  Great value
Clean tables. Well staffed for the impending rush.  We also tried their cookies for the first time.   Boy were we missing out.  Delicious.

name: Michael Gerou
text: Went there today for lunch and my 5yr old is allergic to wheat. We walked because they want to charge 3 dollars extra for the gluten free crust. Not right to charge extra for an allergy. So blaze pizza has lost our business for good.

name: Tina Williams
text: This was my first time going to Blaze Pizza and I loved it. The pizza was delicious, the customer service was great and I will be going back soon!

name: Prep 2 Survive
text: Great atmosphere. Great pizza and service. Very clean. We will be back.

name: Cedric Waller
text: Great pizza at a decent price. I can eat a whole pizza in one sitting. Only to wish the next day I had leftovers.

name: Pat Scruggs
text: This was my first visit because I wanted to support fundraising for Good Neighbor. We really liked the pizza. It was quick and very good. The workers were friendly, and there is a nice family atmosphere. Will definitely go back!

name: Savannah Hubbard
text: Amazing! Got the rising rust 10/10

name: Regina Wol
text: Got a coupon in the mail for a free Blaze Pizza and decided.... why not! It’s a fairly new restaurant in Alcoa so I’d never tried it before. Let me tell you I’m so glad I did. The food is amazing and the customer service is out of this …More

name: Kerry McIntosh
text: Fast, efficient, good pizza. It's brick oven cooked and tastes much better than delivery. Highly recommend if you like pizza.

name: hhop 3333
text: First and last time coming here. The staff was rude . Also it was to long of a wait .. plus made pizza wrong , when I got home, it was hard and burnt. I wasted too much money for this.  I do not recommend this place.. unless you just want to waste your money.

name: Jake not from Statefarm
text: I tried the new cauliflower pizza crust and was highly impressed and it was a healthier option so that's a plus. The staff was friendly and very helpful. Awesome place to go grab a bite.

name: Cherrie Miller
text: The pizza was amazing!!! Only angst was half of the underneath crust was burnt...loved that they had roasted garlic,minced garlic to add for toppings for free...I ordered the high rise pizza dough because I like a thicker crust....

name: Brian Crabtree
text: Didnt get to physically go but I finally got to try this fantastic pizza

name: Casey Riggs
text: I have eaten in Blazes from Texas to Tennessee. Alcoa, TN was by far the best. From staff to taste this place was the best I've been in. Arlington, TX Blaze needs to send some employees here to see how it's done.

name: Jess Payne
text: So amazing!

name: MARVIN WEST
text: I like the quality, freshness, speed of service and overall experience of eating at Blaze. YOU pick the toppings and how much YOU want

name: Rick Austin
text: I love Blaze Pizza it is such a simple concept but the best option for pizza.  They have different crust options and the toppings are always fresh.

name: Travis Gammons-Pallaria
text: This is one hell of a pizza joint. Great job guys.

name: tim rooney
text: The pizza was too good, I had more than I should have. The person taking our older was extremely good!

name: Katie
text: We love going to Blaze! My kids love the experience with Amanda. She is always so friendly with them! Thank you for being so great!

name: Jack Merner
text: Stopped off to get a bite to eat after a long day of traveling and shopping and service was great! Will be returning before leaving town.

name: Wendy Cox
text: Consistently good. My favorite pizza, love the keto crust option.

name: Brian Turner
text: Good chain pizza joint.

name: Bob Bowers
text: Great pizza with a modern atmosphere! Really like how everything is fresh and no artificial ingredients and made right in front of you. Awesome prices too!

name: Mike Triantafellou
text: The best!

name: Katherine Parker
text: It was a great atmosphere and the employees were awesome. The food was pretty good too

name: Dana Combs
text: Never disappointed. We drive over an hour just to go to Blaze

name: Eddie McFluffbutt
text: Had a fantastic meal here, and had a wonderful conversation with an amazing woman named Amanda. She was so polite, and very friendly! Sure, the food is good, but great customer service can make it all better!

name: Trese Lowe
text: This is a great location. Kathy is always very friendly and witty in helping take my order and Amanda is always friendly and helpful in ringing up my order. Amanda helped me download the Blaze App to save me money and get great deals. Food is excellent and employees are too.

name: Ksenia Wright
text: Love the pizza. The boxes are different but in a really good way. The place is very clean, open and nice. Fast service!

name: Debbie Simmons
text: Delicious pizza fast! Yum!

name: Shawn Smelcer
text: Love eating the pizza here .. just wish it didn't have to be as pricey as it is.  I would say that's the only reason we don't frequent this establishment more often.  Having two daughters that love two completely different pizza toppings makes for an expensive meal.

name: mason hopkins
text: I am a vegan, and Blaze pizza has vegan cheese; it’s staff also offer to change their gloves if you are gluten free or vegan, they even asked me if I wanted the pizza sauce that had a lid on it because cheese could sometimes get into the …More

name: Donna Stephens
text: So good.. well priced

name: Timothy Reed
text: Food is excellent.  You get to pick as many toppings as you want for your pizza.

name: Dusty Leopper
text: Staff is always so nice and helpful. Great pizza good price. Eat here all the time.

name: Michael Carver
text: The keto crust was good.

name: Edwina Nichols
text: If you like creating your own individual pizza the place to go

name: Ellen Payne
text: Love being able to "build your own" pizza and/or salad.  Wide choice of ingredients.  Wish they had iceberg lettuce.  Awesome that they have started using plant-based (non-plastic) straws.

name: Sherry Hill
text: The build your salad is great. The build your own pizza is cool idea. Was not impressed with the pizza. They do have glueten free and keto friendly crusts.

name: Tony Torres
text: Very friendly staff and delicious fresh ingredients. We had the Greek salad and a white garlic pizza on a hand-tossed crust.

name: Tina Hodges
text: I went to Blaze Pizza for the first time tonight because I wanted a good sausage pizza and my co-workers said their pizzas were great. Imagine my surprise when I got home and opened the box to this. Never again will I go there. It's a 12" …More

name: Cyndi Long
text: First time that I have been to Blaze pizza. It is a well ran pizza place. The staff knew there job and performed it really well. Smiles and helpfulness was A1. Would recommend this to many people. Easy to get to off of 411 Highway to get in and back on.

name: Emily Smith
text: One of the best pizza places in town. The garlic pesto sauce is the best!

name: Heather Gammons-Pallaria
text: Awesome pizza!  Great price!  So glad they built one closer to me.

name: Incognito Potter
text: Build your own pizza Subway style. Lots of unique toppings. $5.50 for cheese only individual pizza. $8.25 for all the toppings you want. These are thin crust. Thick crust costs $2 more. We were there when it was very busy, but the line …More

name: Michael Kolodziej
text: The place has become a family tradition... once discovered you’ll see for yourself how great this place is! …More

name: Andrew
text: Went on a Saturday evening and it was pretty busy. The line was probably 20 people deep, but they moved through it very quickly. The selection and pricing are wonderful. You can get a full pizza with everything you want for less than $10. The quality is decent, not 5 stars, but still head and shoulders above chain resturant pizza.

name: Peter Walter
text: Loved the atmosphere and of course the thin crust and medium crust pizza. There are a million ways to have your pizza made. The actual time it takes to make the pizza is unreal. The wait is well work it, as this place is hopping.

name: Pamela Milliken
text: This is a great place to build your own pizza. Everyone in my family loves it. Their half salad and half pizza combo is perfect.

name: Joshua Archer
text: Fast, fresh, delicious pizza. Made your way. And the Blood Orange Lemonade is amazing!

name: Brian McCarthy
text: Good and fast

name: Atlas Arkan
text: Tim and Jacob are two of the most funny, and respectable employees I've never met. They make great pizzas for me everytime and make even better conversations each time. Great pizza and amazing pizza Artist keep me coming back.

name: LA Cate
text: Best gluten free crust of any pizza restaurant I’ve tried!  Shout out to Bryston, the young man that works in the dining area...  he is extremely polite, checks on customers to ensure that they have what they need, offers to take your empty pans, etc.  In other words, excellent customer service!

name: Jon Honaker
text: Staff was awesome! Food was great and fast. Plus the fountain black cherry soda (big or blue sky soda, I think) was the best soda I've ever had! Will go again!

name: Rob Peck
text: Great food, both pizza and salad, but they do tend to be a bit expensive... Price you pay for good food though I guess

name: Mike McReynolds
text:
Fantastic , Pile it high as you want!
Only $8.00. Over 100 toppings to pick from. You will have it to your table or in a box in minutes.
A+

name: Matt Spradlin
text: My first time at this store. Service fast and everyone was nice. Was great to see my old manager Amanda who is always friendly. Highly recommend this location!

name: Ali Salim
text: Love this place. Food and service is always great and fast.

name: Ken
text: Perfect location, great staff, tons of seating options and the food is amazing. Would love for some more beer options but that's not the focal point of the this place. THEY DO PIZZA RIGHT. Topping choices are perfect and creative. Great for a date spot or a family get together.

name: Cyndi Camarillo
text: Their food is really good healthy and tasty

name: Matt Sharp
text: Pretty good local pizza. Kinda like subway, but you build your own pizza add your own toppings.

name: Kyle Pettine
text: Always great service here and the food is great! The pizzas have a great flavor because of the way that they are cooked in the stone oven. Would definitely recommend trying this place out! It is one of my favorites!

name: Stephanie Smith
text: Fabulous pizza for a great price! Very friendly employees & a clean eating area make for a great dining experience. My only complaint is that the last couple times they have been out of root beer...which is our favorite.

name: Joseph Overholt
text: Blaze is always great. The employees are polite, the food is good, and it doesn't break the bank. I recommend getting a "build your own", as you get unlimited toppings for one price.

name: Wilbur Barton
text: Now our favorite pizza place. Love the gluten free offering. Friendly and helpful staff. Delicious pizza.

name: Amanda Joy
text: My son and I LOVE Blaze! He gets excited about all of the options for toppings and really enjoys watching them build his pizza. This is 1 of 2 places in Maryville that I'm aware of that has gluten free crust. It is just frustrating that …More

name: Tanya Simon
text: Great service! Staff was very friendly and helpful. Ordered build your own and was.impreased with all the fresh ingredients you can choose from. The pesto sauce was so good. I will only eat blaze pizza from now on.

name: Summer Finger
text: We went on pie day and it was amazing customer service !! Amanda the cashier did amazing and job and was very friendly!!! Made us feel very welcomed!! Over all a great experience and awesome staff but Amanda went out of her way to help us in any way she could !!! I will return because the pizza was awesome !!!!

name: Caitlin Moore
text: I freaking love this place! Best pizza hands down. I started eating blaze when I was in Knoxville then moved back to Maryville and was so sad that we didn't have one. Then finally they opened one and I'm so happy because like I said ...best pizza EVER

name: Alex Thompson
text: Fair prices, good food, exceptionally friendly employees, and fast service!

name: Andrew Spaulding
text: Awesome staff and the pizza wad bangin.

name: Bryant Laney
text: Really impressed with Blaze especially considering they have a keto crust that is actually tasty and edible.

name: John Romines
text: Little pricey but good food

name: Keith G. Knight
text: Good pizza.  Very fresh--- they make it right in front of you, to your wishes.  A little expensive, tho'.

name: Jason Howard
text: This is some really tasty pizza at a price you can't beat.

name: Mark Eblen
text: Great pizza, cheap and quick! Build your own with anything you want on it!!

name: Jerry Gunnels
text: A good place to eat pizza

name: Denton Dresser
text: I almost thought I was late for lunch today when I saw Amanda leaving, but she smiled big and said thanks for choosing us for lunch! Everything was great as always! A+++

name: Melissa Rhyne
text: The cauliflower crust is really good 👍👍

name: Shirlisa Harris
text: Nice facility and excellent service, but seemed pricey. I laid out $11 for a Veggie Pizza and a soft drink! Flavor of food was decent enough, but crust was thin---TOO thin.

name: Gary Cowden
text: fresh hot pizza & friendly service

name: Michael Johnson
text: It's like Subway for pizza! I love blaze and the prices are reasonable. This location is always quick and clean.

name: Parker Wenzel
text: The gluten free pizza is just horrible

name: Heather McNeil
text: Cauliflower crust is delicious, although not at all low carb...but they also have a keto crust that is quite tasty.

name: Alan Wells
text: Build your own is the best!  Closest to NY thin Crust pizza I've found in TN.

name: Nick Sena
text: Best pizza in town. Do yourself a favor and order this...Build Your Own, High Rise crust, classic red sauce, shredded parmesan and mozzarella, chorizo, basil, red onions, pineapple, crushed garlic, oregano, then top with arugula. Oh mama.

name: Jeff Lloyd
text: Great pizza and options, fast service.

name: Timothy Jacobs
text: Blaze is my most favorite pizza joint in the world! I was so pumped when I walked into the new alcoa location and saw my favorite manager Amanda!!! Everything is clean, food is great, service is friendly what more could you ask for!?!?.

name: David Mills
text: Must try it. Get the build your own pizza deal. Best deal on pizza

name: Heather Hatton
text: This is one of the few places that everyone in our family can find something they love to eat--dairy free, gluten free amd low carb. The wood fired oven is awesome and the service is great!

name: Super Alpha96
text: Super friendly staff that was patient as I had never been there before. Really cool pizza concept. Went ahead and orderd the build your own and was not disappointed. Pizza crust is thin but you get the custom order pretty quickly. Ordered …More

name: Michael Jackson
text: Fast friendly great pizza for the price

name: Jimmy Thomas
text: Great place to go for good pizza

name: Pamela Baker
text: My first experience was on pie day. Very organized. Loved the pizza. Highly recommend!!!

name: Deborah McFadden
text: Absolute best pizza around!  Quality of pepperoni and beef toppings is unmatched in this area.  We can't even eat at Barley's anymore!

name: Jonathan Forrester
text: What's not to love about blaze. This is a favourite for my family because of the quantity and quality of the food and the friendliness of the staff. The store is always very clean as well as the bathrooms. The staff makes sure they take …More

name: Pamela Hogan
text: Great pizza! Really kind, helpful staff. We'll definitely go back. A great product at a great value.

name: Justin Borden
text: Fun place with good food! Just make sure you like really thin, crispy crust pizza!

name: Dalai Dalay
text: Vegan Chorizo pizza it's my favorite   😍🤩😘

name: Kyle Fowler
text: Its like a Subway for pizza, you choose your bread, sauce, cheese, and toppings and they make it in front of you. They have a good selection of all the ingredients and it's cooked in a brick oven. My fiance likes their vegan cheese.

name: Sam Eileen
text: This place is ridiculous.... They refuse to give you a deal in store unless you order online. Im standing here, in store, cash in hand, and they want you to get on your phone to place the order... On my way to pizza hut who will gladly give me any deal they have... Screw this place.

name: Lorraine Hennion
text: Quick service

name: Matthew Fowler
text: I went to try this place for the first time because I had received a coupon in the mail to buy a pizza and get one for free.  My wife and I decided to head over and get pizzas for a late dinner after watching Avengers in the movie theater. …More

name: Marwa McGinnis
text: The cauliflower crust pizza is the best

name: Jane Gaby
text: Fast-food pizza. Tons of topping choices. You go through a line like at Subway. Pizza in thin crust and pretty tasty. They have beer and soft drinks.

name: Joshua Webb
text: This was FANTASTIC! I had been waiting to try Blaze, and it did not disappoint. The entire staff was friendly and helpful. The food was FAST- barely had time to get my drink- and DELICIOUS. Will be back often!

name: Richard Dunlap
text: A great fast pizza option.  Choose from a large assortment of fresh toppings for your pizza.  Tasty fresh salads and the option of low calorie water drinks.

name: b.nicole at CrystalCreations
text: This place is so yummy! I love how they run things here and the options. We were so impressed.

name: A Dickens
text: The pizzas are really great tasting, the build your own is really nice for pizzas. It can be slightly pricey for the size of the pizzas

name: Patrick Cox
text: Myriad of ingredients to choose from. Meal sized pizza with excellent thin crust. Only complaint would be the employees attention to detail when the store gets busy.

name: Mossomanium _______
text: Awesome service! Good speed, and amazing quality! Also very friendly workers! I came in for free pizza and Amanda was there, i came back again and she made sure everyone took care of me!

name: Greg Goodman
text: Went in for lunch on Tuesday and the food along with the atmosphere and engaging staff was amazing. Amanda introduced me to the Blaze Pizza app which is a must have. The only thing better than Blaze Pizza is FREE Blaze Pizza!!!!!

name: Garrett Nunes
text: Mine was perfect. My wife's got really burnt on the bottom. I'm sure they would've gave us another one but unfortunately we got it to go. Will try again!

name: Tami B
text: Love, love, love this place. Great food, great price

name: Brittany M
text: The pizza is always delicious and staff are quick and courteous.

name: donna hembree
text: I'm not the biggest fan of pizza, but I love this place. Always great food.

name: Taylor Smith
text: Delicious food made fast at a great price! Lots of staff to help move things along quickly. Changes gloves if you need gluten free due to allergies and the crust for that tastes sooo good! Definitely recommend!

name: carrie Bradley
text: The pizza is great. Usually great customer service except for three people today. I was asking for extra cheese. My pizza went thru three people in the assembly line and I asked each one for extra cheese. They just acted like it was a hassle to be there. Get another job!

name: Steve
text: Great atmosphere and the food is great. No Miller Liter though, but they have Coors lite, Blue Moon, Lagunita IPA in bottles and a couple Angry Orchard brands in cans & bottles.

name: Jonathon L
text: Pizzas are small and skimpy on the toppings.  Not ideal for men, your going to be hungry when you leave fellas. Pizzas are ok, the soda options are good. The staff seemed like they liked their job. Just expensive for not enough pizza.

name: Curt Roberts
text: Great service, Extremely friendly, and amazing food. Rachel and Amanda were very knowledgeable!

name: William Davis
text: It's the subway of pizza. Build your own and they'll throw it in the fire for you. They were very good. My wife and I split a pizza and a side salad, which was plenty.

name: Tony Long
text: Good value, fast service, decent pizza. I would give it a 3.75 but not quite a 4 star rating.

name: Paula Jones
text: Super fresh! Really friendly and helpful, delicious! Highly recommend.

name: Nathan young
text: Awesome food and friendly servers

name: Jayla Sanderson
text: Recently had a horrible experience with ordering via phone. The server we encountered was rude and inconsiderate which made it worse since we eat there quite often. I placed an order and the young lady assured me it would be ready in 15 …More

name: Edward Williams
text: Friendly service, good food, cool little pizza joint

name: Troy Verbowski

text: I visited the store in Alcoa, every single person in there was so helpful.  This was my first time ever eating at a Blaze Pizza. My pizza was absolutely delicious.  I ordered a build my own and it was so amazingly good. I would definitely …More

The consistency of the brand is top notch. My last visit Bryston at the Alcoa location was so helpful and even took my empty pizza pans away. My new fav!
